description: Lionel Messi dribbles past three defenders and scores with a beautiful chip over the goalkeeper!
LeBron James with a monster dunk over two defenders, bringing the entire arena to its feet!
Rafael Nadal hits an incredible passing shot down the line to win the championship point at Wimbledon!
Tom Brady throws a perfect 40-yard touchdown pass to Mike Evans with just 5 seconds left on the clock!
Simone Biles lands the first-ever Yurchenko double pike in women's gymnastics, creating Olympic history!
Katie Ledecky breaks the world record in the 800m freestyle by a full three seconds!
Cristiano Ronaldo scores with a bicycle kick from the edge of the penalty area, silencing the home crowd!
Stephen Curry hits a buzzer-beater from half-court to win Game 7 of the NBA Finals!
Novak Djokovic saves three match points and goes on to win the fifth set tiebreak to claim his 24th Grand Slam!
Erling Haaland scores his fifth goal of the match, becoming the youngest player to score five goals in a Champions League game!
